{% if product.metafields.custom.event_handle != blank %}{% assign event = shop.metaobjects.event[product.metafields.custom.event_handle.value] %}{% if event.what_to_expect != blank %}{{ event.what_to_expect }}{% else %}We'll start with a brief introduction to laser-cutting technology, safety, and design preparation. Then you'll move into the fun part — cutting your design! Each participant will have guided access to the machine, time to experiment, and plenty of creative freedom. All materials are included, and you'll leave with your completed project and new maker confidence.{% endif %}{% else %}We'll start with a brief introduction to laser-cutting technology, safety, and design preparation. Then you'll move into the fun part — cutting your design! Each participant will have guided access to the machine, time to experiment, and plenty of creative freedom. All materials are included, and you'll leave with your completed project and new maker confidence.{% endif %}

He has years of experience combining technology with art, from 3D printing to laser cutting and handcraft design.
